subscribe:
To use the `/subscribe` command, you first must create a webhook. (refer to `/help Creating a webhook` if you do not know how to do this). Copy the webhook URL and use it in the `/subscribe` command as shown below:

> `/subscribe https://discord.com/api/webhooks/12345.../abcdefg...`

After running the command, a message will be posted in the channel the webhook belongs to, confirming a successful setup.
webhook: To create a webhook, navigate to the settings page of a text channel and open the `Integrations` tab. Press `New Webhook` and copy the URL. The name and icon of the webhook do not matter, as those can be changed with the `/config` command.
